casebody.data:
Nicholas J. CURTIS, Appellant, v. Matthew WOLL, in His Official Capacity as Third Vice President of the American Federation of Labor, an Unincorporated Association, and Joseph N. Weber, in his Official Capacity as Sixth Vice President of the American Federation of Labor, an Unincorporated Association, Appellees. No. 236. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 7, 1938. Nicholas J. Curtis, appellant, appearing in person. Arthur E. Reyman, of Washington, D. C., and Carol C. Johnson, of New York City, for appellees.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
